description: Show the full details of a specific action item.
permissions: Admins can view any action item. Non-admins can view action items only when their memberships and team membership satisfy the ActionItemPolicy scope (membership in or above the responsible organization, including broker/manager membership for customers, or being on the action item team).
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --show-all-comments is a boolean flag; when omitted, only the 3 most recent comments are shown.

flags.name: --show-all-comments
flags.description: Show all comments (default shows 3 most recent)
